channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description: ok so i added port on my firewall. i got to my router sight or whatever and im on the port forwarding page. i have a motorola router. i got a 508 source and client what would be my start port and end port??? oh and for the local ip addres would i put the last 3 didgets of my ip or what????? pleas pleas reply i really need help im stuck lol
